Articles.Content:
Hey all. Just been watching some YouTube videos and then searching the web, and it seems that since version 23.5 of the game the Double-C Seismic Accelerometer is supposed to give you a menu that says "Start Recording" "Stop Recording" and "Collect Impact Data". Well I'm running the latest version (24.2) and the only things on my right-click menu (as well as Action Groups in the VAB) are "Toggle Display" and "Log Seismic Data". Any clue as to what's up? Do you have the ability to record/stop recording and collect impact data in your game?

Edit: Thanks for the quick response!

Edited July 28, 2014 by Targa

Hey all. Just been watching some YouTube videos and then searching the web, and it seems that since version 23.5 of the game the Double-C Seismic Accelerometer is supposed to give you a menu that says "Start Recording" "Stop Recording" and "Collect Impact Data". Well I'm running the latest version (24.2) and the only things on my right-click menu (as well as Action Groups in the VAB) are "Toggle Display" and "Log Seismic Data". Any clue as to what's up? Do you have the ability to record/stop recording and collect impact data in your game?

That functionality comes from the KSP Interstellar Mod.
